coverages.details: Covers non-refundable overseas transport and accommodation expenses paid in advance if the trip is cancelled before departure due to unforeseen circumstances specified in the policy, including contracting COVID-19 resulting in serious sickness. For COVID-19 cancellation, the event must occur within 30 days before departure, and the policy must be bought at least 3 days prior to departure unless the cause is accidental. Standard plans do not cover pre-existing conditions.
Covers additional administration charges for postponing the trip due to specified unforeseen events occurring within a certain period before departure.

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Limit for extra expenses to return to Singapore

coverages.details: Covers non-refundable trip expenses paid in advance and additional transport costs to return to Singapore if the trip is cut short due to specified unforeseen events, including contracting COVID-19 resulting in serious sickness. Standard plans do not cover pre-existing conditions.

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night

coverages.details: Covers additional accommodation and transport expenses incurred overseas if the trip is disrupted due to specified events.

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Delay while overseas (Adult)
Per insured person - Delay while overseas (Child)
Per insured person - Delay after 6 hours while in Singapore (Adult)
Per insured person - Delay after 6 hours while in Singapore (Child)

coverages.details: Pays a cash benefit if the scheduled public transport is delayed for more than 6 consecutive hours from the scheduled time. The delay must not be caused by the insured and requires written confirmation from the transport provider.

Covers additional travel and accommodation expenses to arrange alternative transport if the insured misses a connecting flight/transport due to the late arrival of the incoming scheduled public transport.
Pays a cash benefit if the insured is denied boarding on a scheduled public transport due to overbooking and no alternative transport is offered within 6 hours.

coverages.coverage_name: If the travel agency becomes insolvent
coverages.details: Covers irrecoverable travel or accommodation costs paid in advance directly to a registered travel agency that becomes insolvent.

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Delay while overseas (Adult)
Per insured person - Delay while overseas (Child)
Per insured person - Delay after 6 hours when arriving in Singapore (Adult)
Per insured person - Delay after 6 hours when arriving in Singapore (Child)

coverages.details: Covers the cost of emergency essential clothing and toiletries if checked-in baggage is delayed for more than 6 consecutive hours upon arrival at the overseas destination or back in Singapore.

coverages.coverage_name: Loss or damage of baggage and personal belongings

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Limit for laptop
Per insured person - Limit for watches, jewellery or valuables in total
Per insured person - Limit for other items (for each item, set or pair)

coverages.details: Covers accidental loss or damage to baggage, clothing, personal belongings, golf equipment, and portable electronic/computer equipment during the trip. Subject to per item/pair/set limits and overall limit. Depreciation may apply.
Covers loss of cash, bank notes, currency notes, or traveller's cheques due to robbery, burglary, or theft during the trip. Requires police report within 24 hours.

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night

coverages.details: Covers the cost of replacing lost or stolen passports, visas, or travel tickets, and additional travel and accommodation expenses incurred to obtain replacements.

coverage_categories.category_name: Personal Accident and Medical Expenses Benefits

coverages.details: Provides a lump sum payment in case of accidental death or permanent disablement occurring during the trip. The benefit amount depends on the severity of the injury according to the policy's scale of compensation (e.g., 100% for death/total permanent disablement, 50% for loss of one limb/sight in one eye). Public transport double cover is not available for the Classic plan.

limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over (combined for sections 14, 18 and 19)
Limit for medical aids and equipment

coverages.details: Covers necessary medical, surgical, hospital, and emergency dental expenses incurred overseas due to accidental injury or sickness during the trip. Includes treatment by a licensed Chinese medicine practitioner or chiropractor (subject to Sec 16 limits). Covers COVID-19 related treatment overseas. Standard plans do not cover pre-existing medical conditions.

limits.type: Limit for medical aids and equipment

coverages.details: Covers follow-up medical expenses incurred in Singapore within 30 days of returning, for an injury or sickness first treated overseas. Also covers expenses if first treated in Singapore within 3 days of returning. Includes treatment by a licensed Chinese medicine practitioner or chiropractor (subject to Sec 16 limits). This section is excluded from COVID-19 cover.

coverages.coverage_name: Treatment by a Chinese medicine practitioner or a chiropractor

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Limit per visit

coverages.details: Covers expenses for treatment by a licensed Chinese medicine practitioner or chiropractor, either overseas (as part of Sec 14) or as follow-up in Singapore (as part of Sec 15), subject to per visit and overall sub-limits. Refer to policy conditions for specific requirements.

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Benefit per day

coverages.details: Pays a daily cash benefit for each full 24-hour period the insured is confined in a hospital overseas as an inpatient due to accidental injury or sickness.

Covers reasonable and necessary costs for emergency medical evacuation (including transportation and medical care during transit) to the nearest appropriate medical facility or back to Singapore, if deemed medically necessary. Must be arranged by the designated assistance company.

Covers the costs of returning the insured's mortal remains back to Singapore, or the costs of overseas burial or cremation if death occurs during the trip due to covered injury or sickness. Must be arranged by the designated assistance company.

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night

coverages.details: Covers the reasonable travel and accommodation expenses for one relative or friend to travel to the insured if the insured is hospitalised overseas for more than 5 consecutive days.

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Benefit per 24 hours

coverages.details: Pays a daily benefit if the insured is unlawfully detained (kidnapped or held hostage) during the trip for more than 24 hours.
Reimburses the cost of emergency telephone calls made from overseas to the assistance provider or family members in relation to a covered hospitalisation or medical emergency.

limits.type: Per insured person - Overall section limit
Per insured person - Limit per item (for each item, set or pair)

coverages.details: Covers loss or damage to the insured's home contents in Singapore due to burglary or attempted burglary while the home is left vacant because of the trip.
Covers the insured's legal liability for accidentally causing bodily injury to another person or accidental loss/damage to another person's property during the trip.
Reimburses the insurance excess or deductible amount that the insured is liable to pay under the rental vehicle agreement due to loss or damage to the rented private vehicle during the trip.

Provides cover under Sections 1 to 25 (except exclusions like nuclear, chemical, biological terrorism) if losses are caused by an act of terrorism. The payout is subject to the lower of the original section limit or the terrorism sub-limit specified here.

limits.limit: See limits of respective sections that apply

coverages.details: Extends cover under relevant sections (e.g., Trip Cancellation/Shortening, Medical Expenses Overseas, Emergency Evacuation, etc., but excluding Medical Expenses in Singapore - Sec 15) for losses arising due to COVID-19, subject to policy terms and conditions. Requires fulfilling vaccination/testing requirements of destination/carrier. For trip cancellation/shortening, COVID-19 must result in a serious sickness.

limits.limit: See limits of respective sections that apply

coverages.details: Allows purchase of Per-trip plans within one day after departing Singapore. Coverage applies only to events occurring after the policy purchase time. Claims related to known events or losses occurring before purchase are excluded. Section 8 (Travel Agency Insolvency) is not covered under this extension.

limits.limit: Covered under relevant sections (e.g., Medical, PA)

coverages.details: Covers participation in leisure adventurous activities like scuba diving (max 30m, with PADI cert or instructor), skiing, snowboarding, hiking/trekking (below 4000m, public access or organised/guided), bungee jumping, skydiving, hot air ballooning, etc., provided safety procedures are followed and licensed guides/instructors are used where available. Excludes extreme sports. Refer to policy conditions for full list and specific requirements.

limits.limit: 1 or 2 adults (spouses/partners, >=16 yrs) and unlimited children (<21 yrs, biological/adopted/ward)

coverages.details: Adults must be the parent or legal guardian of the children. All must be insured under the same policy. For single trip plans, the family must travel together for the entire trip.
Coverage period is automatically extended at no extra cost if return is delayed due to covered public transport delay (not caused by insured) or necessary hospitalisation overseas.

The Classic plan (along with Deluxe and Preferred standard plans) does not provide coverage for any claims arising from pre-existing medical conditions. Income's Enhanced PreX Travel Insurance should be considered for such coverage.
